text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Well then, once more…… my name is Mejiro Ardan. 
From now on, I look forward to working under your kind guidance.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Yes. 
…Well, this might seem a bit sudden, but―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
This weekend, could I ask you to accompany me? 
-Trainer-san.
And, just like that―

text_block_list.name: Elderly Maid
text_block_list.text:
Well then… my lady Ardan, be careful but please enjoy yourself. 
Trainer-sama, please take good care of my lady.

…After riding in a vehicle provided by the Mejiro household, we arrived 
at an art gallery.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu, Trainer-san, there's no need to be so stiff. 
Granny, thanks for escorting us. We'll be off then.

Maybe it was because I was still a little nervous from earlier, 
but I couldn't keep calm and ended up glancing around…

When I do, I happen to see what is apparently the title 
of this special exhibit.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Yes…… originally I had planned to explore the exhibit myself 
since I was interested, but I wanted to see if Trainer-san 
would accompany me.
choice_data_list: What kind of exhibition is it?
What kind of exhibition is it?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
…There's a wide variety of exhibits. 
Painting, sculptures, photographs, film, handicrafts―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: But each and every one of those, has one single common theme.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: All of these were completed 'posthumously'.

In this venue, there certainly were a lot of works on display. 
After hearing these were all completed posthumously, at first I thought 
this would be a somewhat formal affair, but―

When I actually looked around, there were things that made me 
stop and look, and things that made me contemplate, if I had to say it, 
it seemed like a normal art exhibition.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: That's true. To most people, I think that's often the way it seems.

After that, we took our time looking around the venue. 
And when we stepped back outside―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, there's one more place I'd like to stop by. 
There's a forest behind the art gallery, would it be alright to take a look?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
You see, there's one last work that's on display there. 
…No matter what, I'd really like to see it at least once.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Could I trouble you to accompany me for just a bit longer?

Together we headed in to the forest. It seemed like not many people 
knew about this work, since I didn't see any other visitors around.
But, at the place―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Yes… that's right, this is it. 
…This is what I wanted to see.
There was a single painting.

…Sun bleached, weatherbeaten, faded until it was a shadow 
of its former self, a single painting.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
The one who created this, said this work could "only be displayed outside", 
as part of their will it seems.

For a long, long time, together with Mejiro Ardan, 
I stayed silently gazing at the picture―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
As I'm sure you're already aware. 
…I was born with a frail, extremely weak body.

After leaving the art gallery, we were taking a short break at a cafe. 
That was how Mejiro Ardan, calmly started our conversation.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Even so, my older sister, who was also born with a weak constitution, 
miraculously recovered, and I've been holding on to that faint 
sliver of hope, but―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
It seems that, things haven't been going that smoothly. 
But that's how it normally is, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
My physician told me "To put it blunty, your body is not built for racing. 
Injuries and worse could be waiting for you based on my examinations."

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
…My parents, even now, are against me racing. While in tears, 
they told me they were dreadfully afraid of what might happen to me 
just the other day.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
I was originally supposed to be born with a twin but… the other was 
stillborn. They're probably desperate to make sure I don't 
meet a similar end.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
However- 
Even with all that. 
Even despite that, Trainer-san.

And saying that, Mejiro Ardan — with those eyes 
filled with extraordinary resolve, cast her gaze at me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
There's no telling when my body will break down. 
It's even possible that in the brilliant history of the Mejiro family, 
or even that of Uma Musume, I may quickly be forgotten.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Quickly fading, or quickly forgotten. 
-Even still, "Right now".

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Right now, in this moment, to shine brilliantly even at the cost of my life, 
is the one right still permitted me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: No matter how short. Or fleeting. Or how slight that shine is.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
I, myself, wish to use the miracle of my life, 
to leave at least one mark "right now".

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: ……Would I be able to ask for your cooperation, Trainer-san?

Mejiro Ardan, once again asked this of me. Each of the times before this, 
when faced with her resolve I was left speechless, but―
choice_data_list: That picture from before, must definitely have been beautiful
That picture from before, must definitely have been beautiful

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
choice_data_list: I'll do my best to make sure Ardan also shines like that
I'll do my best to make sure Ardan also shines like that

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Trainer… san……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: …No, I'm sorry. I rudely assumed that you were a bit more on the timid side.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: You have… much more so than I thought, resolved yourself, haven't you?
After that, I took Mejiro Ardan's hand, and we once again shook.

"Right now" she's pushing forward to shine brilliantly, 
and I strongly swore to do my best to support her……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: (…Regarding that painting, there's one more anecdote that I know.)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
(That painting's creator, had a partner that helped 
support them in their work-)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
(That painting, was addressed to their partner, 
using the last of their strength to bequeath it to them.)
